name: Deuter Climber Backpack - Children to Youths
description: Take your rock apprentice with you. Designed for young climbers, this pack is built with the same gear-focused details as Deuter's adult models. The harness provides a good balance of support and comfort and at 22 liters, it's big enough for your sidekick to carry their own gear. Exterior pockets keep water bottles and a headlamp grab-able.Durable 210-denier nylon.DWR coating sheds light precipitation.Top loading design closes with 2 buckes.Youth-specific Alpine Harness system for support and airflow.Sternum strap with an integrated safety whistle.Removable hipbelt with 2 gear loops.2 stretch mesh side pockets.1 zippered security pocket, with a key clip.Hydration compatible (reservoir sold separately).Helmet attachment.Tool/pole attachments.Recommended torso length: 25-43cm.
